strategy: Use a Gaussian Process-based policy with a sparse Bayesian prior to model the reward landscape of the MountainCarContinuous environment, enabling uncertainty-aware exploration and adaptive action selection. This approach avoids traditional neural network parameterization and leverages probabilistic inference to guide exploration toward high-reward regions, especially in the challenging valley region of the environment.
